Encountered an issue where a particular plug-in contributed help, but didn't implement the properties file to map to context IDs. This throws an ugly NPE.

at com.sybase.stf.powerbuilder.dw.wizard.NewDWLibraryWizardPage.createControl(NewDWLibraryWizardPage.java:57)

Created an attachment (id=75561)
Help patch that includes NPE fix and help key fix

John, can you deliver a fix for me?
